title: HOUR 1 - Cowboys, Bills, Wild Card
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Cowboys, Bills, Wild Card
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Colin dissects the Dallas Cowboys' frantic, final seconds of their loss to the San Francisco 49ers--including their questionable call for a quarterback draw. Also, it's clear to Colin that New England head coach Bill Belichick doesn't yet have the quarterback to compete with Josh Allen of the Buffalo Bills. Lastly, former NFL quarterback and current FOX Sports NFL analyst Michael Vick joins The Herd to reflect on the weekend's quarterback playoff performances. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
